{"step_by_step_thinking": "According to the documents, alcohol and HPV are mentioned as causes of head and neck squamous cell carcinoma. Betel nut is not mentioned in the documents, but it is a known risk factor for oral cancers, which are a subset of head and neck cancers. EBV, or Epstein-Barr virus, is not mentioned in the documents as a cause of head and neck squamous cell carcinoma.", "answer_choice": "D. EBV"}
